summary: Implemented an animated neon start/menu canvas scene and updated Home/Lobby pages to use it; revamped HUD styling with large neon digits; added neon palette/glow CSS/Tailwind utilities; enhanced gameplay VFX (laser glow/trail, explosions, point-drop rendering, score popup rendering); and upgraded SFX playback with WebAudio-based stereo panning while respecting mute. However, the diff summary does not provide evidence that the required generated image assets were actually added under frontend/public/assets/generated, nor does it clearly show (due to truncation) the full competitive scoring/elimination logic (head-vs-body elimination, respawn to initial length, point-drop spawning/collection and growth, and score updates for cows/penguins) being implemented end-to-end.

missing_requirements.requirement: Updated competitive scoring model: award points when eating objects and when eliminating an opponent, with on-screen score feedback popups.
missing_requirements.reason: Score popup rendering and scoring constants/types are present, but the diff summary does not show the actual game-loop logic that increments score when eating cows/penguins and on elimination, nor the creation/lifecycle of score popups at those events (useGameLoop.ts is truncated before scoring/collision handling evidence).

missing_requirements.requirement: Competitive elimination rule: body hits opponent head resets opponent to starting size; winner can collect dropped point items to gain score and grow.
missing_requirements.reason: Types/constants/rendering for POINT_DROP and elimination drop counts exist, but the diff summary does not show the head-vs-body collision detection, opponent reset to INITIAL_SNAKE_LENGTH, spawning of POINT_DROP obstacles, or the collection logic that increases score and grows the winner (useGameLoop.ts is truncated before that logic is visible).
